name: Spiced Pears and Pomegranate
author: misslisa
summary: An easy fruit dessert made with fall fruit that can be served with a cheese selection.
ingredients: 3  pears - peeled, cored and cut into wedges
1  pomegranate, skin and light-colored membrane removed
4 sprigs fresh mint leaves for garnish  (Optional)
directions: Place the sliced pears and pomegranate seeds into a bowl
Toss with lemon juice to coat
Combine the brown sugar, nutmeg, and cinnamon in a small cup or bowl, then mix into the fruit
Cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour before serving to blend the flavors
Serve in individual dishes, and garnish with a sprinkling of chopped almonds and a sprig of mint
